cards

Class CardsArrayList

  • java.lang.Object
    • cards.CardsArrayList

  • public class CardsArrayList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has get and set method for the arrayLists. This also has removedCardFromArray() and addCardsToArray() methods

      • addCardsToList

        public java.lang.String addCardsToList(Card c)
        This method gets the card and checks type of the card and adds it to the respective array lists
        Parameters:
        c - card type="clubs" add the respective card in clubs
        Returns:
        card added after successfully insertion

      • removeCardsFromList

        public java.lang.String removeCardsFromList(int position,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<Card> c)
        This method removes the element. When the position is greater than the array list then it throws error as "array size underflow card cannot be removed". If position is within the card size then it is removed successfully
        Parameters:
        position - takes the position of the element which has to be removed
        c - takes the card number
        Returns:
        whether it is removed or underflow has Occured
